page.title: 02LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: { }This is a compiled list of leisure activities for local Junior age children. Scouts. Girl Guides. Gymnastics. Swimming Club. Kung fu. Red Cross. St.John's Ambulance Association. Music Lessons. Flute. Guitar. Recorder Piano. Roller Skating. Roller Hockey. Ice Skating. Ballroom/Disco Dancing. From a survey of eleven year olds in our school we discovered that the most popular leisure activity is watching television.Reading and biking came a close second and third came organised activities like Scouts. Fourth and fifth came cricket and football. The most popular T.V. programmes are Grange Hill and Nightrider and popular authors Enid Blyton and Roald Dahl.
